messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 1605
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 11/20/01 5:34:01 PM Mountain Standard Time, ... I was in an accident 7 years ago and have nerve damage and soft tissue problems in my back.
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/20/01 5:34:01 PM Mountain Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:


> As for pain meds, I used tylenol 3's for my cyst burt only because I
> could not sleep otherwise. I roll in my sleep and ever movement was
> causing stabbing pains that woke me up.
>
>
I was in an accident 7 years ago and have nerve damage and soft tissue
problems in my back. I was on so many different meds and had a bout w/
ulcerative colitis and then a problem was caught 2 weeks before they took my
one med off the market for killing people. Lovely. Right now I have a major
headache from my neck and my back is burning and killing me, I'll be up most
of the night. I refuse to take anything anymore though. I only wish I could
afford my therapies more than once a month. I would feel 100 times better w/
weekly or more treatments for a period of time.

We all do what we have to for ourselves.

NICKI~



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
